attributes.action: make Cavendish Road Centre for the Arts at South East Derbyshire College Ilkeston, Derbyshire, formerly a School for girls and a historical building within the area, a listed building.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Cavendish Road Centre for the Arts, currently owned by South East Derbyshire College, formerly a School for Girls' is an integral part of the landscape of Ilkeston; it is going to be sold by South East Derbyshire College, perhaps on to developers who would demolish the building in order to use the vast amnount of land on which the building stands, as space on which to build new houses. This building deserves to be saved.
